t: What is the quality of Irwin, Estwing, and Kobalt tools compared to big name brands like Dewalt, Stanley, Milwaukee, etc.? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 8): Well, Black and Decker owns DeWalt, Craftsman, Stanley, and Irwin. t: Hand tools: Stanley or Irwin? - DoItYourself.com Community Forums
s: April 22, 2008 - I have used both Stanley and Irwin tools with no problems. Craftsman is good, as is Klein. Did you know that Lowe's brand Kobalt now carries a lifetime guarantee on all hand tools too?

t: Which Tools to Buy When Several Brands Sells the Same Thing?
s: If the UPC started with 757595 ... toolboxes made by Waterloo, 045325 is on items made for Sears by Vermont American and 024721 on items where Irwin-Hansen was the supplier. Using the UPC prefix also sometimes lets you track down the OEM for other house brands like Husky at Home Depot and Kobalt at ...
